AllJoyn Java API

Package org.alljoyn.bus

This package holds all of the AllJoyn code for creating and using interfaces.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AuthListener Authentication listeners are responsible for handling AllJoyn authentication requests.
BusObject Implemented by classes that are AllJoyn bus objects.
BusObjectListener Implemented by a user-defined BusObject that is interested in handling registration and unregistration notifications.
IntrospectionListener Implemented by a user-defined BusObject that is interested in customizing the D-Bus introspection XML presented to remote nodes.
KeyStoreListener Implemented by a user-defined class that is responsible for loading and storing keys.
SecurityViolationListener Allows an application to monitor security violations.
 

Class Summary
AuthListener.AuthRequest Authentication request.
AuthListener.CertificateRequest Authentication request for a chain of PEM-encoded X509 certificates.
AuthListener.Credentials Authentication credentials set via authentication requests.
AuthListener.ExpirationRequest Authentication request to set an expiration time for the credentials.
AuthListener.LogonEntryRequest Authentication request for a logon entry.
AuthListener.PasswordRequest Authentication request for a password, pincode, or passphrase.
AuthListener.PrivateKeyRequest Authentication request for a PEM encoded private key.
AuthListener.UserNameRequest Authentication request for a user name.
AuthListener.VerifyRequest Authentication request for verification of a certificate chain from a remote peer.
BusAttachment A connection to a message bus.
BusListener Bus listeners are responsible for handling callbacks from the AllJoyn system.
MessageContext Contains information about a specific method call or signal message.
Mutable The underlying C++ implementation of the AllJoyn bus is fond of using in/out parameters.
Mutable.IntegerValue A class providing inout parameter semantics for Java ints.
Mutable.ShortValue A class providing inout parameter semantics for Java shorts.
Mutable.StringValue A class providing [in,out] parameter semantics for Java Strings.
OnJoinSessionListener An OnJoinSessionListener is responsible for receiving completion indcations from asynchronous join operations.
ProxyBusObject A bus object that exists and is managed by some other connection to the bus.
SessionListener A SessionListener is responsible for handling session related callbacks from the AllJoyn system.
SessionOpts  
SessionPortListener A SessionPortListener is responsible for handling session port related callbacks from the AllJoyn system.
SignalEmitter A helper proxy used by BusObjects to send signals.
Variant A DBus/AllJoyn datatype whose type information is encoded into the value field.
VariantTypeReference<T> Used when calling Variant.getObject(Class) where the wrapped object is a generic type such as Map<K, V>.
 

Enum Summary
BusAttachment.RemoteMessage Policy for handling messages received from remote devices.
SignalEmitter.GlobalBroadcast Controls behavior of broadcast signals (null desintation).
Status Standard function return codes for this package.
 

Exception Summary
AnnotationBusException AllJoyn annotation related exceptions.
BusException Base class of AllJoyn exceptions.
ErrorReplyBusException AllJoyn ERROR message exceptions.
MarshalBusException AllJoyn marshalling related exceptions.
 

Package org.alljoyn.bus Description

This package holds all of the AllJoyn code for creating and using interfaces.
